title: SET_CONVERSATION_AUDIO_CONTROLLED_BY_ANIM
content:
0x0B568201DD99F0EB0x1193ED6E// SetConversationAudioControlledByAnim
void SET_CONVERSATION_AUDIO_CONTROLLED_BY_ANIM(BOOL enable);Parameters:enable: Pass in true to set conversation flow to be controlled by animation triggers.Sets whether or not scripted conversation flow should be controlled by anim triggers
